entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 11:30 PM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
Temperature: 5.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 57 %
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: S 18 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain or freezing rain beginning before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or ice pellets changing to periods of snow near noon and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Periods of freezing rain inland early in the morning. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
